programme.title: Cameron Vs. Justin & Jessica
programme.desc: S1:E13 Cameron Diaz was one of the biggest stars in the world. So why did she leave it all behind? Our team uncovers a link between Cameron’s explosive breakup with Justin Timberlake and her choice to leave acting behind. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Cameron?Justin sparked cheating rumors when he moved on from Cameron 4 days later with Jessica Biel. Our team gets to the truth behind those rumors to reveal the role Justin played in Cameron disappearing and the truth is even more shocking…

programme.title: Winona Ryder vs. Johnny Depp
programme.desc: S1: E10 Johnny Depp’s trial with Amber Heard had everyone talking, but wait until you hear about Winona Ryder’s. Johnny experienced love at first sight and became obsessed with Winona. But after their breakup, Winona dealt with mental health issues and her own very public trial, which has some striking similarities with Johnny and Ambers. Everyone thought she was a crazy, and the aftermath of her court case left her banished from the world. Winona went through a great awakening outside of the public eye and bounced back into Hollywood.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

Mind The Gap
programme.desc: Join TGR and Anthill Films for a behind-the-scenes peek at the production and release of unReal, their 2015 mountain bike film.

programme.title: UTA: The Climb For Kosovo
programme.desc: In 2017, 34 year-old Uta Ibrahimi became the first person from Kosovo to attempt Everest. Born and raised in eastern Kosovo, her childhood was interrupted by a fierce ethnic war that ripped the heart out of the Balkan nation. Battling against Kosovo’s entrenched gender stereotypes and misogyny within the climbing community, Uta climbed the highest peaks in Kosovo, and then Europe.

programme.title: Homegrown Tour Guide

programme.title: Sea Kayaking in Gaspésie, Québec
programme.desc: A massive and rugged peninsula surrounded by the Gulf of the St. Lawrence, Gaspésie features a dramatic coastline where beautiful wilderness rivers meet the ocean. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks around the iconic Percé Rock and stand up paddleboards the Bonaventure River.

programme.title: Alaska HD

programme.title: Gunnie Season

This is only 4bi9′s fourth feature length film, but you could consider them veterans in the game now. With a list of some of the top skiers in the world featured in their new film, it will be a must see. I recently sat down with the masterminds behind it all, AJ Dakoulas and Andrew Napier, and their assistant videographer/editor Kevin Steen for an interview about their season, and the making of Gunnie Season.

programme.title: The Mentor

In an emotional and powerful act of closure, he reflects on the accident that took him a decade to talk about—and climbs the route that took his mentor’s life.

Cyclone is determined to gain an edge over Flame by doing as many good deeds as possible, but his efforts result in a series of unfortunate events. Can Flame rise to the challenge and resolve these issues, ultimately earning possession of the Super Tornado Accelerators?

programme.title: Airship of Dreams
programme.desc: Can the Q-Star League overcome the challenge of stopping Cyclone from hijacking Q-Towns beloved airship? As the Buster Gang plots their next move, they must remember that true success comes from honest and fair actions. Let us believe in the power of doing what is right and standing up for what we believe in. Together, we can achieve anything we set our minds to.

programme.title: REGENERATOR
programme.desc: A plane containing a highly classified government project crashes outside a small town in the USA. Realizing the level of danger, the government is secretly trying to fix the problem. As tension grows, the situation gets out of control, and civilians from the town face their worst nightmare.

programme.title: TO KILL FOR LOVE
programme.desc: Gaspard de la Roche, a man of inestimable wealth, was found dead in his castle, leaving a huge legacy of 50 million. But is it an accident or murder? No one knows. His beautiful young woman, single claimant, in turn, is in great danger. Someone appears desperate to seize the property of the deceased millionaire.

programme.title: Paatuthalaivan With Lyricist Priyan
programme.desc: Ananda Vikatan is one of South Indias leading media powerhouses renowned for its seven much-loved Tamil magazines, popular television content, enlightening books, and a website thats now emerged as the bridge that connects the smartest Tamilians across the globe.

programme.title: ""I haven't asked for my remuneration dues, but still.." Sai Priya | Paambattam"
programme.desc: In this episode, actress Sai Priya opens up about the issues she faced in the Paambattam movie. She also shares her working experience and speaks about the recent controversy at the teaser launch event.

programme.title: Aalaya Dharisanam: Sri Petti Kaaliamman Temple
programme.desc: Sakthi Vikatan is the Tamil spiritual fortnightly magazine from the Vikatan Group. This digitized series covers the various Holy shrines in and around Tamil Nadu.

programme.title: Anirudh laughs at rumors about his marriage!
programme.desc: Anirudh Ravichander is an Indian film composer and singer. He made his debut in the Tamil film, 3 directed by Aishwarya. The song, ""Why This Kolaveri Di"", which Anirudh had composed for the Tamil film 3, went viral on YouTube and tracked more than 85 million views. His subsequent albums have all become commercial successes and he has won acclaim from critics for his soundtrack music and background recordings.

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2017
programme.desc: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards is an annual awards ceremony for people in the Tamil film industry. It is presented by the Tamil language weekly magazine Ananda Vikatan. The awards were introduced in the year 2008, honouring the films that were released in 2007.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 9
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 17
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.desc: Prepárese para ver algunos videoclips histéricos y trepidantes enviados por espectadores que comparten los momentos más divertidos de sus mascotas y personas favoritas.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Prepárese para ver algunos videoclips histéricos y trepidantes enviados por espectadores que comparten los momentos más divertidos de sus mascotas y personas favoritas.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Prepárese para ver algunos videoclips histéricos y trepidantes enviados por espectadores que comparten los momentos más divertidos de sus mascotas y personas favoritas.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: FRUITFUL MULTIPLICATION
programme.desc: Four green Fruit Ninjas find their first real-life enemy in the form of an ancient ninja with a score to settle.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: BASHAS BANDANA
programme.desc: Basha has washed his bandana and has put it for drying. He is taking an afternoon nap when the bandana flies and reaches Sundar. Basha wakes up and is shocked to see his bandana gone. His is so not comfortable getting out without his signature bandana. He quickly makes a bandana with leaves and gets out in search of his missing bandana. To his utter horror he sees that Sundar has found it. For once, the roles have changed in Hotel Kelifornia and now Basha is running after Sundar for his dear bandana. Sundar is absolutely enjoying this attention and is making Basha do all sorts of funny things in exchange of the bandana. He even gets Basha to put up a show for the customers. But in the middle of a crazy chase, the bandana reaches back in Bashas hands. Back to his style, Basha is all geared up to tell Sundar who the boss is! Oh boy!

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: KUSHTI ME MASTI
programme.desc: It is a regular morning in hotel Kelifornia until the much feared wrestler comes in for food. Sundar is all set to please him. But things go for a toss when the wrestlers arch-rival comes in and expects to be served by Sundar. A hapless Sundar is torn between the two angry fat men. And to add to the misery is our super mischievous Basha who is making sure that Sundar messes up everything with the wrestlers. The chain of events reach a point where the wrestlers start a kushti fight inside the hotel and BashamakES sure that Sundar becomes their punching bag. Will Sundars luck save him?!!!

programme.title: A Smelly Taco Surprise
programme.desc: Nardy makes a Taco Surprise which gives Zap a bad case of smelly gas. Will the embarrassed Smighty help when Sneevil rides into Smightyland in his gigantic Bowling Boulder Ball?

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: Tommys Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornPromi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: Little big lizard
programme.desc: The twins help a tiny lizard who everyone was ignoring, find a princesss ring and save the day.

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Paper Plate
programme.desc: Simple yet the possibilities are endless, Hepi and Briko surprise us with their ideas

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Hi Five
programme.desc: Pancake splits off four copies of himself, which makes trying to catch them five times more difficult! And he’s having trouble counting that high. Always keep trying/resilience to failure.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: Polka dots
programme.desc: YoHe wants to be like YoShe. Together with his sister he jumps into a world in which everyone and everything is a copy of a copy and he learns how much important it is to be different

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: Sing us back home
programme.desc: a panda steals Ragoo’s bamboo stick. She flees through the trees and the twins chase him, so they all end up lost

programme.title: Top Car
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: It's Hard Being A Mommy
programme.desc: A baby duck comes out of its eggshell and the first thing it sees is Duda. So, he thinks Duda is his mom! Duda ends up taking care of the baby hoping his mother will come for him soon. But the baby duck is a handful and causes Duda quite a bit of trouble. Duda realizes that it is difficult to take care of a baby. The friends decide to go find the ducks real mother and leave the baby in Scots care. At first, Scot thinks that taking care of the baby is an easy job, but he quickly learns that it is not. Eventually, they find the babys real mother, and its time for Duda to say goodbye. Duda is sad to see the baby duck leaving..

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: Weather Boy
programme.desc: Rain keeps Fred and his buddies stuck inside, until Friday secretly clears the rain clouds, earning Fred the name, “Weather boy.” Brains warns Fred never to try that again, though Nora begs him to make her beach party have a sunny day. Fred’s tinkering attracts a strange gas cloud, which they must freeze, causing snow on the beach.

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: A Slice Of Fun
programme.desc: Ding Dong. It’s the pizza delivery boy. Don pays the cash and open’s the box to find only leftover olives and baby corn! Sad and dejected, he decides to make his own pizza, but is tricked by Lary Marly and Charly as always!

programme.title: Silly Smighty Day
programme.desc: Its Silly Smighty Day and Zap thinks hes just too serious of a Smighty to show his silly side. But all that changes when Sneevil and Biggs transform Smighties into helpless puppies. Now Zap has to put on the act of a lifetime and pretend to be a puppy to stop the Villains.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: Imagine Dragons
programme.desc: Maple learns the power of imagination when she imagines a dragon in the Zooniverse, and it goes out-of-control!. Learn to think things through.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: The Fat Worm - Thumbelina
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of THUMBELINA, by Hans Christian Andersen. On this occasion, they have not been called out to solve a case, but rather to be guests at the wedding of CORNELIUS, the prince of the Land of Flowers, who is getting married to THUMBELINA. But not long after arriving in this idyllic place, inhabited by tiny fairies and imps, SANDRA and FO have to set to work as usual, as a bird from the distant frozen climes of Sereland kidnaps THUMBELINA, before the wedding. SANDRA and FO travel to Sereland, discover THUMBELINA’s whereabouts and rescue her from MR. MOLE, a rich, powerful, blind mole, who is still in love with the voice of sweet little

programme.title: Afternoon Off
programme.desc: To prove to Brains he can go one day without Friday, Fred agrees to a day without him, picking a day he ends up desperately needing him.

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: The Palace Garden
programme.desc: Jamillah lands inside a beautiful garden, she encourages Aladdin to come and join her but he warns her to get out, they are the Palace Gardens and shell be locked away if shes found in them! But Jamillah has no way out so Aladdin decides to try and rescue her. He rushes home to Genie but Genie doesnt hear in time so he tries to find a ladder on his own to hop over the fence and save Jamillah. Genie catches up with him just as he gets to the palace walls and realizes that the ladder isnt big enough, so he makes it longer. They climb into the palace only to find Jamillah happy and smiling playing games with the Princess. Soon they are all playing and having fun

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Where’s Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Trolly Troll arrives in Smightyland, but her big size scares everyone except Leila. Leila befriends the gentle giant and when Sneevil creates his Mecha-Sneevil Machine and tries to destroy everything, its Trolly Trolls "bigness" that helps save the day.

programme.title: It's OK To Make Mistakes
programme.desc: Dada and Bubbles make a delicious dish together. Soon, Duda shows up and wants to decorate it with ketchup, but ends up pouring it all over Bubble. Meanwhile, Caber is busy organizing his books at home. Duda comes and offers to help, but only causes more mess. Later, Duda sees an apple and tries to pick it for Bubble; Unfortunately, he loses his balance and falls into a paint that splatters all over Pinkar. Poor Duda is having a very bad day. With the help of Scots Time Machine, Duda decides to travel back in time and fix his "mistakes." Will Duda be able to undo his mistakes? Or will he discover something quite surprising?

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: Tell Me Your Wish
programme.desc: A new friend visits the Unknown Forest. Its Annie, Cabers adventure-loving cousin. Its love at first sight for Duda. Wanting to impress, Doubt tells a little white lie and announces to everyone that there is a magic box by the Hot Hot Springs that grants wishes. He borrows Scots box and hides inside as if he were the genie in the box. His friends come and each makes a wish, forcing Duda to do everything he can to grant them. Finally, its Annies turn. Unfortunately, she wishes for a fluffy white cloud. Not wanting to disappoint Annie, Duda tries his hardest to literally reach for the sky. Somehow, Annie realizes that it was Duda with the magic box all along. Seeing that he struggles to catch a cloud for her, she decides to change her wish...

programme.title: Warqa, The Eggless Chicken
programme.desc: Aladdins favourite chicken has stopped laying eggs. His mother tells him to sell it at the market. The butcher at the market is rumoured to be a fearsome fellow. Jamillah and Aladdin cant bring themselves to sell Aladdins favourite chicken so they call on Genie to help Warqa lay eggs again. His spell works but soon shes hatching everything but eggs and the money from that helps to save Warqa from the butchers knife.

programme.title: Infieles
programme.desc: La atracción entre Ozán y Asli se ha vuelto incontrolable. Ozán busca desesperadamente excusas para huir de casa y estar a solas con Asli.

programme.title: Infieles

programme.title: Infieles
programme.desc: El comportamiento de Asli despierta sospechas y desconfianza en su amante Ozán. ¿Oculta algo?

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Kachrewali love Story + Tarpan
programme.desc: In this captivating movie, we follow the story of Aarifa, a young woman who embarks on a journey towards self-liberation. The movie explores the themes of freedom from societal and cultural expectations, specifically in relation to hijab and intercaste marriage. As Aarifa navigates through the complexities of her life, she discovers the true meaning of freedom and the importance of staying true to oneself. The film presents a powerful message about the value of self-determination and the courage to challenge traditional norms and beliefs. Through Aarifa's story, "Wings of Freedom" sheds light on the struggles faced by many individuals seeking to break free from societal constraints. This movie is a must-watch for anyone who believes in the power of self-expression and the importance of embracing one's individuality. Join Aarifa on her journey towards self-discovery and witness the beauty of freedom. Watch "Wings of Freedom" now!

programme.title: CITY TOUR - " PUNTA DEL ESTE" CON GRACIELA ALFANO (Invitada Especial)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Leo Saleh y a la icónica Graciela Alfano en un exclusivo recorrido por Punta del Este en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV - TULUM (MEXICO)
programme.desc: Explora la magia de Tulum con Leo Saleh en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV ( VIAJE EN CRUCERO !! ) MSC CRUCEROS
programme.desc: En el programa de hoy te mostramos nuestro viaje en un exclusivo crucero junto a la empresa MSC , estuvimos presentes en la temporada inaugural de Grandiosa. El espectacular MSC Grandiosa, con capacidad para 6.300 huéspedes, 2.421 cabinas y 19 cubiertas, presume de un diseño moderno y sorprendente y de una gran cantidad de experiencias e instalaciones que llevarán su viaje al siguiente nivel.

programme.title: FASHION DISTRICT: ¿Dónde y cómo INVERTIR EN MIAMI 2025? Mejores zonas, oportunidades y tips para el Real Estate
SHE RESONATES: Brenda Carrasco
programme.desc:
Chicas Guapas TV presenta SHE RESONATES, un nuevo programa que amplifica las voces de mujeres en la industria de la música, destacando sus trayectorias, desafíos y logros.
En este primer episodio, Dakyta entrevista a Brenda Carrasco, vicepresidenta de marketing y estrategia artística en Warner Music Latina. Brenda comparte su inspirador camino desde México hasta Estados Unidos, los retos de ser inmigrante en la industria y cómo logró posicionarse en un rol de liderazgo dentro de una de las compañías discográficas más influyentes del mundo.
No te pierdas esta conversación llena de aprendizaje y motivación para todas aquellas que buscan dejar huella en la música.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Yami Safdie & Sarai
programme.desc: El atardecer en Miami se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión acústica única en Full Moon Sessions. Yami Safdie emociona con una interpretación íntima de su hit En Otra Vida, seguida por Sarai, quien cautiva con su propio repertorio, creando una tarde llena de música y momentos especiales. Desde la terraza del W Hotel Brickell, la calidez del sunset y la energía de ambas artistas se combinan con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.
